title: Shaun the Sheep 2: behind the scenes of Aardman's latest adventure
text:
It is hard to imagine that many problems are encountered in the softly humming corridors of Pixar or DreamWorks that can be solved with a splash of glittery nail polish. But in the workshop at Aardman Animations, the stuff was recently responsible for a full-blown technological breakthrough.

The studio’s model makers were working on prototypes of a new alien character called Lu-La for their forthcoming Shaun the Sheep film, but were struggling to imbue her clay antennae with a convincing extraterrestrial glow.
